summary: gives jzargo a new look, a custom spell, and a new AI allowing him to heal and he is essential.
descriptionHtml: I have made jzargo look like a badass. Use this mod to give him and other khajiit hd detail. http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1581/? He has a custom spell( it looks like his favorite spell sparks but it is more powerful). He has been switched to the preist AI so he can heal(Vanilla Followers AI mod needed for this feature) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61620/? And finally he is essential so you cant kill him on accident...or on purpose anymore.Â
author: Mrmole2000
